markdown: # VOYAGA YETMAGANLAR TOMONIDAN SODIR ETILGAN JINOYATLAR VA ULARNING OLDINI OLISH CHORALARINING HUQUQIY ASOSLARI [Skip to main](#main) [![Zenodo home](https://zenodo.org/static/images/invenio-rdm.svg)](https://zenodo.org/) [Communities](https://zenodo.org/communities) [My dashboard](https://zenodo.org/me/uploads) [Log in](https://zenodo.org/login/?next=/records/15808361) [Sign up](https://zenodo.org/signup/) Published July 4, 2025 | Version v1 Journal article Open # VOYAGA YETMAGANLAR TOMONIDAN SODIR ETILGAN JINOYATLAR VA ULARNING OLDINI OLISH CHORALARINING HUQUQIY ASOSLARI ### Creators - [Nazarov Raxim Toshtemirovich (Contact person)](https://zenodo.org/search?q=metadata.creators.person_or_org.name:%22Nazarov+Raxim+Toshtemirovich%22) ## Description _Mazkur tadqiqot voyaga yetmaganlar orasida sodir bo‘layotgan jinoyatlar va ularning oldini olish mexanizmlarining huquqiy jihatlarini o‘rganishga bag’ishlangan._ _Maqolada O‘zbekiston va xalqaro amaliyot asosida voyaga yetmagan jinoyatchilar bilan ishlashning innovatsion metodlari tahlil qilingan. Tadqiqot davomida 2019-2024 yillar oralig’idagi empirik ma’lumotlar o‘rganilgan va voyaga yetmaganlar jinoychiligi dinamikasi baholangan. Natijalar shuni ko‘rsatadiki, kompleks profilaktika yondashuvi takroriy jinoyatchilik riskini sezilarli darajada kamaytiradi. Huquqiy himoya tizimi, ijtimoiy reintegrasiya dasturlari va oila institutining mustahkamlanishi asosiy yo‘nalishlar hisoblanadi. Tadqiqotda diversiya dasturlari va restorative justice mexanizmlarining samaradorligi tasdiqlangan._ ## Files ### 59-63.pdf [Preview](/records/15808361/preview/59-63.pdf?include_deleted=0) ### Files (376.0 kB) | Name | Size | [Download all](https://zenodo.org/api/records/15808361/files-archive) | | --- | --- | --- | | [59-63.pdf](https://zenodo.org/records/15808361/files/59-63.pdf?download=1) md5:8de43dbda1e076a6b164aee729d300a3 | 376.0 kB | [Preview](https://zenodo.org/records/15808361/preview/59-63.pdf?include_deleted=0) [Download](https://zenodo.org/records/15808361/files/59-63.pdf?download=1) | 4 Views 3 Downloads Show more details | | All versions | This version | | --- | --- | --- | | Views Total views | 4 | 4 | | Downloads Total downloads | 3 | 3 | | Data volume Total data volume | 1.1 MB | 1.1 MB | [More info on how stats are collected....](https://zenodo.org/help/statistics) ## Versions ## External resources Indexed in - ![](https://zenodo.org/static/images/openaire.svg) [OpenAIRE](https://explore.openaire.eu/search/result?pid=10.5281/zenodo.15808361) ## Communities ## Details DOI ![10.5281/zenodo.15808361](https://zenodo.org/badge/DOI/10.5281/zenodo.15808361.svg "Get the DOI badge!")
